  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class DDButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
    Create a JButton that can be put into a ButtonGroup. represents a Channel for a Display or a Display
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation, 2012
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DDButton

        public DDButton(Channel channel,
        Display display,
        int maxLen)
        Parameters:
        channel - (may be null) The Channel that this button represents
        display - (may NOT be null) the Display that this button is associated with. If channel is not null, this is the Display that the channel is associated with. If channel IS null, this is the actual "select this display" button
        maxLen -
